attributes.action: ensure that the whole of the £900m raised by the sale of the Chelsea Barracks is used solely for the repair and refurbishment of the dilapidated accommodation provided for members of our Armed Forces and their dependants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government has agreed to provide £650m for the improvement of Armed Forces' accommodation and there is concern that the balance left over from the sale of the Chelsea Barracks will be expended on other projects.   The whole of the £900m obtained from the sale of Armed Forces barracks should be allocated for the improvement of Forces accommodation.
